plants.name: ZZ Plant
plants.essential-1: Does best in room temp (60 - 70  F
plants.essential-2: Grows best in bright filtered light
plants.essential-3: Allow solid to become dry to touch between watering days
plants.whatNotToDo-1: Does not do well in cold temp (45 F and below
plants.whatNotToDo-3: Avoid over watering! This plant does better with less water

plants.name: Bell Pepper
plants.essential-1: Peppers need a lot of sunlight in order in order to produce healthy fruit
plants.essential-2: Grows best in bright filtered light
plants.essential-3: Allow solid to become dry to touch between watering days
plants.whatNotToDo-1: Does not do well in cold temp (45 F and below
plants.whatNotToDo-3: Avoid over watering! This plant does better with less water
